description: From a series of nine etchings, Das Gesicht (The Face), published by Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924, housed in a blue-green portfolio case with a title page; in green ink the head and shoulders of a boy looking directly at the viewer; a wisp of hair stands upright at the top of his head; diagonal lines set closely together cover parts of his forehead, his cheeks, and across a portion of his neck; area around and between eyes, tip and under the nose, chin, and a portion of the neck are colored in pale pink
inscription: LL in pencil, below image: 4) | LL of sheet, in pencil: Eigendrucke / E.162 | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: E.162 2429
portfolio: From Plate 8 from Das Gesicht (The Face), Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 22
title: Boy's Head (Self-Portrait), Plate 8 from Das Gesicht (The Face)
